actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to require that a judge sentencing a person convicted of a felony in the Superior Court of the District of Columbia consult with other judges of such court with respect to the appropriate sentence to impose on such person.

summary.text: Requires that a judge sentencing a person convicted of a felony in the Superior Court of the District of Columbia consult with two other judges of such court with respect to the appropriate sentence to impose on such person.

titles.title: A bill to require that a judge sentencing a person convicted of a felony in the Superior Court of the District of Columbia consult with other judges of such court with respect to the appropriate sentence to impose on such person.
